name.ja: 流星連打－シロクロイド

text.en: During the Battle Phase, if 5 or more attacks were declared this turn (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can only use this effect of "Meteorush - Blackwhiteroid" once per turn. If this card battles, it gains 1000 ATK for each attack the turn player declared this turn, during the Damage Step only.
